name: "Ghost Ship" (by The INFORMational Wizards)
description:
Play Options:

  • "Story File" is the complete interactive narrative, as a parser. Clicking this will download the .gblorb file. To run this, you will need an interpreter that supports Glulx games. A recommended interpreter is Lectrote. Once you have Lectrote running, press "Open Game" and select the .gblorb file.
  • "Play In-Browser" is the demo of a visual point-and-click way to interact with the narrative, which uses the Bag of Tricks extension. This is a proof of concept for the Inform 7 extension; the whole narrative is not currently playable in this form.
